findings.title: Multiple uses of undefined behavior in tinycbor
findings.description: The finding reports multiple instances of undefined behavior in the tinycbor library, which was locally patched to remove the undefined behavior caused by offsetting a null pointer.

findings.title: Undefined behavior in base32 codec
findings.description: The `base32_encode` and `base32_decode` functions invoke undefined behavior when processing certain inputs due to left-shifting an `int` variable too many places or with a negative value.
